name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Sliced banana and crushed peanuts (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen bananas, peanut butter, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Top with sliced banana and crushed peanuts
Optional: Add chocolate chips, granola, or honey drizzle
